workflow.title: Gathering info from SDSS into a VOTable to execute Sextractor, Galfit and Ellipse.
workflow.description: This workflow joins two main nested workflows:- "Extract SDSS field information and PSF" workflow, which gathers information from SDSS VO service and from the header image in several VOtable. It also generates the psf files.- "Joining VOtables with information to execute Sextractor, Galfit and Ellipse" workflow, which joins the VOtables generated by the previous workflow to get only one VOtable with all the information
